snippet: Groups supporting a ballot proposal for a school finance overhaul said they delivered more than 160,000 signatures on petitions Monday.
lead_paragraph: Groups supporting a ballot proposal for a school finance overhaul said they delivered more than 160,000 signatures on petitions Monday.

headline.main: Colorado: Referendum Sought to Raise Taxes for Schools Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Referendum Sought On Schools Overhaul
